section_title: INSTITUTIONAL LINKAGE OF THE SECRETARIAT TO THE UN
sentences: SBI first addressed this issue on 29 November (FCCC/SBI/2005/15).
A contact group, chaired by Masao Nakayama (Micronesia), discussed this item on 1 and 3 December, developing a draft COP decision, which was adopted by the COP on 9 December.
enb_long_title: Eleventh session of the Conference of the Parties to the Climate Change Convention and first meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol
